Subject: EDID
Description: Is there a way to collect the EDID (Extended Display Identification Data = metadata formats for display devices to describe their capabilities to a video source). The EDID data structure includes manufacturer name and serial number, product type, phosphor or filter type and more. We are looking to know is there are some specific devices (e.g. KVMs) that are used by our users.
Solution_Comment__c: The devices are not exit points so the users can no copy file on these devices.
